document.full_text: standard & poor's cut ireland's debt rating by just one notch and gave the thumbs-up to its bank bill on friday but rival fitch's warning of another downgrade and a big drop in growth expectations spelled trouble ahead.
document.title: s&p cuts ireland; fitch in downgrade threat
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's cut ireland's debt rating by just one notch and gave the thumbs-up to its bank bill on friday but rival fitch's warning of another downgrade and a big drop in growth expectations spelled trouble ahead.
